languages.text:
Помилованные каторжане Веабоса-6 рады доказать, что им не зря дали второй шанс, даже ценой своей жизни. Из них собраны вышколенные аварийные команды.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} получает −40% {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при таране и +50% к шансу уменьшить длительность каждого из {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренних пожаров{/g} на 1 раунд

The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round
languages.original_text:
Помилованные каторжане Веабоса-6 рады доказать, что им не зря дали второй шанс, даже ценой своей жизни. Из них собраны вышколенные аварийные команды.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} получает −40% {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при таране и +50% к шансу уменьшить длительность каждого из {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренних пожаров{/g} на 1 раунд

traits.locale_text: The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance that they have been granted, even if it costs them their life.
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance that they have been granted, even if it costs them their life.

The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The flagship suffer −40% ram damage less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each internal fire by −1 round

The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

languages.text:
Les condamnés de Vhéabos-VI qui ont été épargnés ne gâcheront pas la deuxième chance qui leur est accordée, même si cela doit leur coûter la vie. Ils font des équipes d'urgence bien disciplinées.
~// Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} subit −40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de collision et a +50 % de chances de réduire de −1 round la durée de chaque foyer d'{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendie interne{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

traits.locale_text: Les condamnés de Vhéabos-VI qui ont été épargnés ne gâcheront pas la deuxième chance qui leur est accordée, même si cela doit leur coûter la vie.

languages.text:
ヴィアボス・VIの囚人たちは、たとえ命に代えても、与えられた2度目のチャンスを無駄にしない。彼らは実によく訓練された緊急乗組員である。
~//{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の衝角{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が−40%減少し、50%の確率で砲撃による{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火災{/g}の持続時間が1ラウンド減少する
languages.original_text:
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

traits.locale_text: ヴィアボス・VIの囚人たちは、たとえ命に代えても、与えられた2度目のチャンスを無駄にしない。

ヴィアボス・VIの囚人たちは、たとえ命に代えても、与えられた2度目のチャンスを無駄にしない。彼らは実によく訓練された緊急乗組員である。
~//旗艦の衝角ダメージが−40%減少し、50%の確率で砲撃による内部火災の持続時間が1ラウンド減少する

languages.text:
维博斯六号星获得赦免的犯人不会浪费再世为人的机会，即使这意味着牺牲生命。如今，他们成为了几率严明的应急船员。
~//{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}遭到撞击时，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低40%。旗舰{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部爆发火灾{/g}时，有50%的几率使火灾持续时间缩短一轮。
languages.original_text:
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

traits.locale_text: 在维博斯六号星获得赦免的犯人不会浪费再世为人的机会，即使这意味着牺牲生命。

维博斯六号星获得赦免的犯人不会浪费再世为人的机会，即使这意味着牺牲生命。如今，他们成为了几率严明的应急船员。
~// 旗舰遭到撞击时，承受的伤害降低40%。旗舰内部爆发火灾时，有50%的几率使火灾持续时间缩短一轮。

languages.text:
Los condenados de Vheabos VI que se han salvado no desaprovecharán la segunda oportunidad que se les ha concedido, aunque les cueste la vida. Forman tripulaciones de emergencia muy disciplinadas.
~// La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} sufre un −40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de embestida y tiene +50 % de probabilidad de reducir la duración de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendio interno{/g} en −1 asalto.
languages.original_text:
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

traits.locale_text: Los condenados de Vheabos VI que se han salvado no desaprovecharán la segunda oportunidad que se les ha concedido, aunque les cueste la vida.

languages.text:
Die verschonten Sträflinge von Vheabos VI werden die zweite Chance nicht vergeuden, die ihnen gewährt wurde. Auch, wenn es sie ihr Leben kostet. Sie sind jetzt überaus disziplinierte Notfallcrews.
~// Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} erleidet 40 % weniger Rammbock-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und erhält +50 % auf die Chance, die Dauer jedes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internen Brands{/g} um 1 Runde zu verkürzen
languages.original_text:
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round

traits.locale_text: Die verschonten Sträflinge von Vheabos-VI werden die zweite Chance nicht vergeuden, die ihnen gewährt wurde. Auch, wenn es sie ihr Leben kostet.

Die verschonten Sträflinge von Vheabos VI werden die zweite Chance nicht vergeuden, die ihnen gewährt wurde. Auch, wenn es sie ihr Leben kostet. Sie sind jetzt überaus disziplinierte Notfallcrews.
~// Das Flaggschiff erleidet 40 % weniger Rammbock-Schaden und erhält +50 % auf die Chance, die Dauer jedes internen Brands um 1 Runde zu verkürzen

languages.text:
Vheabos VI'nın bağışlanan hükümlülerinin, kendilerine bahşedilen ikinci şansı çarçur etmeye niyetleri yok. Ucunda ölüm olsa bile. Bu anlayışla sıkı disiplinli acil durum ekipleri oluşturdular.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, %40 daha az koçbaşı {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarına{/g} maruz kalır ve oluşan her {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangının{/g} süresini 1 raunt azaltmak için +%50 olasılık kazanır.
languages.original_text:
The spared convicts of Vheabos VI will not waste the second chance they have been granted, even if it costs them their lives. They have made for well-disciplined emergency crews.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} suffer −40% ram {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} less and gain +50% chance to reduce the duration of each {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fire{/g} by −1 round
